  • Constructor Details

    • Maze

      public Maze(String mazeString, Color wallColor, Color floorColor, Color ceilingColor, String[] enemyTexturePaths, double enemyTextureDuration, String coinTexturePath, String enemySoundPath, String coinSoundPath, String deathSoundPath)
      Creates a maze
      Parameters:
      mazeString - The maze data as a string
      wallColor - The color of the walls
      floorColor - The color of the floor
      ceilingColor - The color of the ceiling
      enemyTexturePaths - The path for the enemy texture
      enemyTextureDuration - The duration of the enemy frames
      coinTexturePath - The path for the coin texture
      enemySoundPath - The path for the enemy sound
      coinSoundPath - The path for the coin pickup sound
      deathSoundPath - The path for the death sound

  • Method Details

    • update

      public boolean update(double dt)
      Updates the maze (moves objects, checks collisions, win/lost etc.)
      Returns:
      Returns if the game should end (ESCAPE was pressed, name was not input after win etc.)

    • render

      public void render()
      Renders all the gameobjects of the maze
